title: How to Style an Oversized Jacket

steps.title: Oversized jackets are already statement pieces on their own.
steps.content: Oversized jackets are already statement pieces on their own. [1] X Expert Source Dina Scherer Wardrobe Stylist & Personal Shopper Expert Interview. 24 August 2021. Try bold colors with a denim jacket, neutrals with a patterned jacket, or pastels with a trench coat or overcoat. [2] X Research source You could also try a monochromatic look for an easy outfit that’s sure to turn heads in a crowd. If you want to add a pop of pattern, try throwing on a long scarf or a fun headband.

steps.title: If you’re getting lost in your jacket, you can cinch your waist.
steps.content: If you’re getting lost in your jacket, you can cinch your waist. Use a leather or cloth belt around the outside of your jacket to show off your figure. [3] X Research source This looks best with a large blazer, trench coat, or overcoat. Try a thick black belt to make a statement, or go for a cloth belt in the same color as your coat for a more seamless look. If you’re going for a streetwear outfit, try using a fanny pack instead of a belt.

steps.title: If your sleeves are too long, they could cover your hands.
steps.content: If your sleeves are too long, they could cover your hands. Roll them up a few times to expose your arms and balance out your outfit. [4] X Research source You can create a fun new look by wearing a long sleeve underneath your jacket and exposing the ends of your sleeves when you cuff them. This works great for all oversized jackets, including blazers, overcoats, and denim jackets.

steps.title: Tighter underlayers look great under a jacket that hits your waist.
steps.content: Tighter underlayers look great under a jacket that hits your waist. [5] X Expert Source Dina Scherer Wardrobe Stylist & Personal Shopper Expert Interview. 24 August 2021. Try wearing a fitted T-shirt, a spaghetti strap tank top, a sports bra, or a bralette under your jacket. [6] X Research source If you want to show some skin, try wearing a crop top or a bandeau top. If your shirt is a little too baggy, use a hair tie to cinch it at the waist and make it more fitted.

steps.title: This is an easy way to style your jacket that looks great every time.
steps.content: This is an easy way to style your jacket that looks great every time. Put on a pair of leggings or skin-tight jeans to create an interesting silhouette from head to toe. [8] X Research source If you have an oversized blazer, use leggings to make a faux-suit for a play on the business casual look. If you’re rocking an oversized denim jacket, make a statement by wearing denim on denim.

steps.title: Try a more modern style to stand out in a crowd.
steps.content: Try a more modern style to stand out in a crowd. Put on wide-legged or straight-legged jeans, then add your oversized jacket on top for a cool, edgy look. [9] X Research source If you’re working with a denim jacket, try matching the wash of your jeans with the wash of your jacket. This look works great with jackets that are slightly more fitted, like blazers and trench coats.

steps.title: You can contrast your oversized jacket with a mini or midi dress.
steps.content: You can contrast your oversized jacket with a mini or midi dress. Put on a dress that has a flowy or A-line skirt, then add your jacket on top for a nice mixture of styles. [10] X Research source To go extra flirty and sweet, try wearing a floral dress. Pair your look with heeled booties or ankle boots. If it’s cold out, add a pair of sheer black tights to keep your legs warm.

steps.title: If you’re working with a blazer or overcoat, you can turn it into a suit.
steps.content: If you’re working with a blazer or overcoat, you can turn it into a suit. Put on a pair of fitted trousers and a blouse, then add your oversized coat on top. [11] X Research source Make this look a little more feminine with some chunky jewelry, like a statement necklace. Pair your look with heeled booties or dress shoes to really play up the business casual look.

steps.title: Oversized jackets and shorts create an interesting contrast.
steps.content: Oversized jackets and shorts create an interesting contrast. Put on a strappy tank top and a pair of denim shorts, then add your jacket on top. [12] X Research source If you’re working with an oversized blazer, this can be a fun way to dress up for date night. Add a pair of strappy heels or ballet flats and bring a small clutch with you. A denim jacket with denim shorts always looks cool. Pair your outfit with some chunky sneakers and tall socks for a fun, casual look.

steps.title: This will add a fun, feminine touch to your oversized outfit.
steps.content: This will add a fun, feminine touch to your oversized outfit. Statement necklaces, dangly earrings, watches, and chunky bangles all look great with an oversized jacket. [13] X Research source Large sunglasses are a great way to draw attention to your face.

steps.title: This will make your outfit look cohesive from head to toe.
steps.content: This will make your outfit look cohesive from head to toe. Heeled boots, combat boots, chunky sneakers, and dress shoes all look great with an oversized jacket. [14] X Research source If you’re petite, wearing chunky boots can give you a few extra inches of height. Tall socks are a fun way to add a pop of color to your outfit.
